participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Emily is friendly and sociable, often enjoying conversations with others. She has a positive outlook on life and loves meeting new people.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a small town and moved to the city to pursue her career in marketing. She enjoys dining out and trying new cuisines.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Jordan is outgoing and ambitious, always looking for opportunities to connect with others. He has a great sense of humor and loves to share stories.
participant_2.background: Jordan is a college student working part-time at a restaurant to support his studies. He is passionate about food and hopes to open his own restaurant one day.

content.text: I work at a restaurant, so i can do it.
